ComicInfo.Summary:
Terry takes his pilots to the devastated East end of London, where the stakes in the squadronâ€™s battle against the German night raiders become all too clear. Meanwhile, out over the North Sea, Stenberg and Wozniak bite off more than they can chew- or do they? Part four of the four-part Vampire Squadron, by Garth Ennis and Tomas Aira. Available with Regular, Wraparound Covers by Thomas Aria, Good Girl Nose Art and Battle Damage Premium Covers by Matt Martin.
